description: shi-dragon is a unique collection of dragons as my members (49) and this is the first 50pcs, to celebrate 50 members.when I have 100 members I will make another 50 shi-dragon. 5 unique backgrounds (bee, hornet, wasp, firefly, iota) and when you collect all 5 backgrounds, as a bonus you will get NFT from another collection (robo turtles).it is always worth collecting 5 unique backgrounds, you will be a VIP for me and occasional surprises will be just for you .The resolution is 4096x4096px and the size of NFT is between 1-3 MB. You can also use the images for commercial purposes. Thank you for your purchase.
name: shi-dragon
